div.p: An extension to provide a date from when the current value of the ProblemStatus applies: since when is the problem current, under control or non-current as defined by the Dutch Clinical Building Block (Dutch: Zorginformatiebouwsteen or ZIB) 'OverdrachtConcern' version 3.0.

description.value: Date from when the current value of the ProblemStatus applies: since when is the problem current, under control or non-current as defined by the Dutch Clinical Building Block (Dutch: Zorginformatiebouwsteen or ZIB) 'OverdrachtConcern' version 3.0.

requirements.value: There is a need to provide a date from when the current value of ProblemStatus (ZIB) or ClinicalStatus (FHIR) applies. Currently, this date field is not provided in the Condition base Resource.

definition.value: Date from when the current value of the ProblemStatus applies: since when is the problem current, under control or non-current.
